Title: Australia
Writer: Stuart Beattie, Baz Luhrmann, Ronald Harwood
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Hugh Jackman, Shea Adams
Plot: Set in northern Australia before WWII, an Englishwoman who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscapes.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 15 wins & 37 nominations total
